channel.title: Time Series on Cleary's blog

item.title: Time Series
item.description: hello people this is the time series example. library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) # Extraction---------------------------- query<-"SELECT yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) # Visualization------------------------- ggplot()+ #geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homerun Totals Throughout the Years")+ xlab("Year")+ ylab("Homeruns")
